name: Configurable Asteroid
description:
Game description :

A retake on old classic asteroid (without inertia) with bullet hell elements and a lot of configurable elements.

You can configure the number of asteroid, how many part they break in, the number of weapons, reloading times, max number of aliens ships and so on...

The mission is to destroy the asteroids, the alien are just there to kill you, no worries.

Controls:

A gamepad with 6 buttons mandatory to play.

Use analog stick to move (pad can be used only in menu)

Escape to pause

The ship has four weapons

1 bullets (self explanatory)

2 a shield (block bullets, destroy small enemies and bump everything else)

3 slow (everything else on screen will be slowed at the cost of your score and bonus multiplier)

4 a missile (initially destroy everything in range then the blast push thing away)

Shoulder buttons can be used to rotate the ship for more precise shouting.

A grazing system add to score and multiplier(or more often than not to your death).

Enemy spawn rate et rate of fire become faster with time(can be configured too).

You can configure lots of parameter from game menu to adapt the difficulty to your preference .

added none microsoft joystick support.
